descriptionMarkdown:
# Fulgora - recycling - 4BB sushi extractor

Hey,

welcome to my first posted blueprint. I wanted to share my little blueprint I've made while designing my Fulgora base recycling.

This blueprint extracts selected material from sushi belt, puts it into buffer and forwards to 2 blue belt if buffer is filled to given lower limit. It stops getting materials from sushi belt when buffer is over upper limit - this indicates that output belts are full.

## Design features

* 4 blue sushi belts compatible
* extracts any single material from all of 4 belts - **parametrized material selection**
* configurable buffer 
    * parameter - number of stacks of selected material
* non-configurable buffer upper limit
    * right now upper limit is const offset of 200 items over calculated buffer lower limit
* quality materials push to logistics network
    * material with quality of uncommon or better are put into active provider chest to push them into logistic network
title: Fulgora 4-belts parametrized material extractor
